item.title: BIG DATA MONETIZATION LESSONS FROM ZILLOW
item.description: The real estate industry has gone through a massive transformation as new real estate websites such as Zillow (and Trulia now owned by Zillow, and Redfin) have brought together Big Data sets on available properties, home buyers, and home sellers.
